summary.span: 封装窗体的数据源。

span.span: Encapsulates the data source for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件提供多种用途。The component serves many purposes. 首先，通过在 Windows 窗体控件和数据源之间提供货币管理、更改通知和其他服务，简化了窗体上的控件与数据的绑定。First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources. 这是通过 使用属性将组件附加到数据源来实现的 。This is accomplished by attaching the component to your data source using the property. 对于复杂的绑定方案，可以选择将 属性设置为数据源中的特定列或列表。For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the property to a specific column or list in the data source. 然后，将控件绑定到 。You then bind controls to the . 与数据的所有进一步交互都是通过调用组件来完成的 。All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the component. 有关如何 可以简化绑定过程的示例，请参阅 [如何：将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到 DBNull 数据库值](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values) 和 [如何：处理数据绑定发生的错误和异常](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding)。For examples on how the can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding). 通过、和等方法完成数据源的导航和更新 。Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as , , and . 排序和筛选等操作通过和属性进行处理 。Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the and properties. 有关将排序和筛选用于的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 组件对 ADO.NET 数据进行排序和筛选](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component)。For more information on using sorting and filtering with the , see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component). 此外，该 组件可以充当强类型的数据源。In addition, the component can act as a strongly typed data source. 通常，基础数据源的类型是通过以下机制之一固定的：Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms: - 使用 方法向组件添加一个项 。Use the method to add an item to the component. - 将 属性设置为列表、单个对象或类型。Set the property to a list, single object, or type. 这两种机制都创建强类型列表。Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list. 有关如何使用 绑定到类型的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到类型](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type)。For more information on how to use the to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type). 你还可以使用将 控件绑定到工厂对象。You can also use the to bind your controls to a factory object. 有关如何执行此操作的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到工厂对象](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object)。For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object). > [!NOTE] > 由于 处理简单数据源和复杂数据源，术语会出现问题。Because a handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic. 在此类文档中，术语 " *列表* " 指的是托管数据源中的数据集合，" *项* " 表示单个元素。Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element. 讨论与复杂数据源关联的功能时，将使用等效术语 *表* 和 *行* 。When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used. 提供用于访问基础数据的成员。 provides members for accessing the underlying data. 可以通过属性检索当前项 ，并且可以通过属性检索整个列表 。The current item can be retrieved through the property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the property. 当前项通过 和 、 、 和 方法支持编辑操作。Editing operations are supported on the current item through and the , , and and methods. 尽管自动为所有基础数据源类型处理币种管理，但此类公开了许多 允许自定义的事件，例如和。Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as and , that allow for customization. 绑定到组件的数据源 还可以使用类进行导航和管理 ，该类提供类似 VCR 的用户界面 (UI) 用于在列表中导航项。Data sources that are bound to a component can also be navigated and managed with the class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list. 尽管 可以绑定到任何数据源，但它旨在 通过其属性与组件集成 。Although can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a component through its property. 类的默认属性 为 。The default property for the class is . 默认事件为 。The default event is . > [!CAUTION] > 类的许多成员对 由属性表示的基础列表进行操作 ，只是将其操作引用到基础列表。Many of the members of the class operate on the underlying list represented by the property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list. 因此，当 绑定到的自定义实现时 ，这些成员的确切行为可能与类文档中所述的行为不同。Therefore, when the is bound to a custom implementation of , the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation. 例如， 方法调用 。For example, the method calls . 本 文档介绍 方法，并了解 底层的方法是否 正确实现。The documentation describes the method with the understanding that the method for the underlying is correctly implemented. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 绑定到的 。The following code example demonstrates a bound to a . 绑定到 包含字体列表的。The is bound to a that contains a list of fonts. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在将新对象添加到由属性表示的基础列表之前 。The event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the property. 此事件在 调用方法之后、创建新项并将其添加到基础列表之前触发。This event is fired after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list. 通过处理此事件，程序员可以提供自定义项的创建和插入行为，而无需强制从 类派生。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 在事件处理程序中，通过将参数的 属性设置 为新项来完成此操作。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在事件中创建的新对象的 类型必须与列表中包含的类型相同，否则将发生异常。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 当绑定到或时，不能设置属性， 因为不能向列表中添加新的 。You cannot set the property when bound to a or because you cannot add a new to the list. 有关提供自定义新项功能的详细信息，请参阅 方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 组件将列表绑定到 控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 事件处理程序会将新项添加到列表中 。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此代码示例摘自 [如何：自定义项添加到 Windows 窗体 BindingSource](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource)中提供的一个更大的示例。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一个新项添加到由属性表示的基础列表中 。The method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the property. 此方法设置以下系列操作：This method sets up the following series of actions: 1. 自动调用方法以提交任何挂起的编辑操作。The method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations. 2. 自动引发事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以通过编程方式处理此事件以构造新的项。This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item. 在事件处理程序中，通过将参数的 属性设置 为新项来完成此操作。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在事件中创建的新对象的 类型必须与列表中包含的类型相同，否则将发生异常。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 如果 未处理事件，并且基础列表为 ，则会将请求传递到列表的 方法。If the event is not handled, and the underlying list is an , then the request is passed to the list's method. 如果基础列表不是，则 会通过其公共的无参数构造函数自动创建项。If the underlying list is not an , the item is automatically created through its public parameterless constructor. 在任一情况下，新项将添加到列表的末尾。In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list. 3. 除非数据源实现接口，否则会立即将新项添加到内部列表中 。The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the interface. 在这种情况下，将不会提交新项，直到发出显式调用 或启动新的列表操作。In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to is made or until a new list operation is initiated. 在提交新项之前，可以通过调用回滚新项 ，在这种情况下，新项将被丢弃。Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling , in which case the new item is discarded. 此方法引发 事件。This method raises the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 组件将列表绑定到 控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 事件处理程序会将新项添加到列表中 。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此代码示例摘自 [如何：自定义项添加到 Windows 窗体 BindingSource](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource)中提供的一个更大的示例。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值 取决于基础数据源类型。The default value for the property depends on the underlying data source type. 如果基础列表实现了 接口，则此属性将委托给基础列表。If the underlying list implements the interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list. 否则， `false` 如果基础列表具有以下任何特征，则此属性将返回：Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics: - 它具有固定大小，由 属性确定。It has a fixed size, as determined by the property. - 它是只读的，由 属性确定。It is read-only, as determined by the property. - 项的类型没有无参数的构造函数。The item's type does not have a parameterless constructor. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性的值后，getter 将不再引用对基础列表的调用。Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list. 相反，它只是返回之前设置的值，直到 调用方法为止。Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the method is called. 设置此属性将引发 事件，并 将设置为 。Setting this property raises the event with set to . 如果将属性设置 为 `true` ，并且基础列表类型没有无参数构造函数，则必须处理该 事件并创建适当的类型。If you set the property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a parameterless constructor, you must handle the event and create the appropriate type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 组件的属性，以 允许用户向 组件的基础列表添加新项。The following code example demonstrates using the property of the component to permit the user to add new items to the component's underlying list. 将此属性设置为将 `true` 导致绑定 控件为新记录显示该行。Setting this property to `true` causes the bound control to display its row for new records. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性由于以下任一原因而发生更改时引发事件：The event is raised whenever the property changes for any of the following reasons: - 更改的当前位置 。The current position of the changes. - 或 属性更改。The or properties change. - 基础更改的成员身份将 导致 引用不同的项。The membership of the underlying changes, which causes to refer to a different item. 例如，添加或删除当前项之前的项、删除或移动当前项本身，或将项移动到当前位置。Examples include adding or deleting an item before the current item, deleting or moving the current item itself, or moving an item to the current position. - 基础列表通过新的排序或筛选操作进行刷新。The underlying list is refreshed by a new sorting or filtering operation. 触发此事件时， 属性将已包含其新值。When this event is triggered, the property will already contain its new value. 是类的默认事件 。 is the default event for the class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用于复杂的数据绑定方案， 属性允许您查看的子集 。Typically used in complex data-binding scenarios, the property allows you to view a subset of the . 仅实现 接口支持筛选的基础列表。Only underlying lists that implement the interface support filtering. 当不 为时 `null` ，会将 此属性传递到基础列表。When is not `null`, the passes this property to the underlying list. 如果在对象初始化过程中设置此属性，则在初始化完成后，调用将会延迟。If you set this property during object initialization, the call will be deferred until after initialization is complete. 若要形成筛选器值，请指定列的名称，后跟一个运算符和一个要筛选的值。To form a filter value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on. 接受的筛选器语法取决于基础数据源。The accepted filter syntax depends on the underlying data source. 如果基础数据源是 、或， 则可以使用为属性记录的语法指定布尔表达式 。If the underlying data source is a , , or , you can specify Boolean expressions using the syntax documented for the property. 属性的值 会影响属性的值 。The value of the property affects the value of the property. 此外， 该值会在数据源更改时保留。Additionally, the value will persist when the data source changes. 若要停止筛选 ，请调用 方法。To stop filtering the , call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将属性用于 。The following example shows how to use the property with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `PopulateDataViewAndFilter` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndFilter` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 窗体应导入 和 命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces. remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然实现依赖于基础列表的 `IndexOf` 方法，但通常会应用以下特性：Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `IndexOf` method, typically the following characteristics apply: - 搜索从第一个元素开始，到最后一个元素结束。The is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element. - 基础方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间与属性的值成正比 。The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the property. - 基础方法通过调用方法来确定相等性 。The underlying method determines equality by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知所有绑定到的控件 ，以刷新其值。The method informs all controls bound to the to refresh their values. 方法通过至少引发一次事件来实现此功能 ; `metaDataChanged` 参数指示基础更改的性质。The method does this by raising the event at least once; the `metaDataChanged` parameter indicates the nature of the underlying change. - `metaDataChanged`值为 `true` 指示的数据架构 已更改。A `metaDataChanged` value of `true` indicates that the data schema of has changed. 在 将设置为时引发事件 。A event is raised with set to . - `metaDataChanged`值为 `false` 指示只更改了一个或多个项的值。A `metaDataChanged` value of `false` indicates that only the values of one or more items have changed. 无论的值 `metaDataChanged` 如何，都会引发事件，并 将设置为 。Regardless of the value of `metaDataChanged`, a event is raised with set to . 因此， 使用的参数调用 `true` 将引发两个 事件。As a consequence, calling with a parameter of `true` will raise two events. 当另一个成员对数据绑定进行重大更改（例如设置或属性）时，将自动调用 。 is automatically called whenever another member makes major changes to the data-binding, such as setting the or properties. 但是，程序员也可以显式调用此方法。However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 组件来绑定不提供更改通知的数组列表。The following code example uses a component to bind an array list, which does not provide change notification. 将从列表中删除一个项，并通过调用方法向绑定控件通知更改 。An item is removed from the list, and the bound controls are notified of the change by calling the method. 此代码示例是在 [如何：使用 BindingSource 在 Windows 窗体控件中反映数据源更新中](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource)提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Reflect Data Source Updates in a Windows Forms Control with the BindingSource](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.ResetBindings#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.ResetBindings/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.ResetBindings#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.ResetBindings/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.ResetBindings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.ResetBindings/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: Causes a control bound to the to reread the item at the specified index, and refresh its displayed value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到指定的项的所有控件 ，以刷新其值。The method notifies all controls bound to the item at the specified to refresh their values. 方法通过 在 将设置为的情况下引发事件来实现此功能 。The method does this by raising the event with set to . 每当对单个项的值进行更改时，将自动调用。 is automatically called whenever changes are made to the value of an individual item. 但是，程序员也可以显式调用此方法。However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 组件将列表绑定到 控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 此列表不会引发更改通知，因此 使用上的方法 来引发 事件。The list does not raise change notifications, so the method on the is used to raise the event. 此代码示例是 [如何：使用 BindingSource ResetItem 方法引发更改通知](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-raise-change-notifications-using-the-bindingsource-resetitem-method)中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Raise Change Notifications Using the BindingSource ResetItem Method](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-raise-change-notifications-using-the-bindingsource-resetitem-method). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 继续数据绑定。

span.span: Resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 是两种方法，允许在简单绑定方案中暂时挂起和恢复数据绑定。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario. 如果在进行验证之前必须允许用户对数据字段进行多次编辑，通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须根据第二个字段更改一个字段，但在验证第一个字段时将导致第二个字段出现错误。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用 可防止在调用之前将更改推送到数据源 ，但实际上不会阻止任何事件发生。Using prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 使用复杂数据绑定的控件（如 控件）根据更改事件（例如事件）更新其值 ，因此调用 不会阻止它们接收对数据源的更改。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event, so calling will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source. 出于此原因，此 和 旨在用于简单绑定控件，例如 控件。For this reason, this and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者，如果 通过将属性设置为来禁止显示事件，则可以在复杂的绑定方案中使用这些方法 `false` 。Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于排序的列名称以及用于查看数据源中的行的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the column names used for sorting, and the sort order for viewing the rows in the data source.

value.span: 一个区分大小写的字符串，它包含列名，后跟“ASC”（升序）或“DESC”（降序）。

span.span: A case-sensitive string containing the column name followed by "ASC" (for ascending) or "DESC" (for descending).

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个区分大小写的字符串，它指定用于对行进行排序的列名称以及排序方向。The property is a case-sensitive string that specifies the column names used to sort the rows, along with the sort direction. 默认情况下，列按升序排序。Columns are sorted ascending by default. 多个列可以用逗号分隔，例如 `"State, ZipCode DESC"` 。Multiple columns can be separated by commas, such as `"State, ZipCode DESC"`. 若要支持排序，基础列表必须实现 或 接口。To support sorting, the underlying list must implement the or interfaces. 此功能可通过属性进行查询 。This capability can be queried through the property. 当属性为时，多列排序将可用 `true` 。Multicolumn sorting is available when the property is `true`. 设置 属性将更改内部列表，具体取决于其类型：Setting the property will change the internal list depending on its type: - 如果列表的类型为 ，则将 在内部列表中设置和属性。If the list is of type , the and properties are set in the internal list. - 如果列表的类型为 ，则 设置属性。If the list is of type , the property is set. 仅当排序字符串不是时，内部列表的排序属性才会更改 `null` 。The internal list's sort properties are only changed when the sort string is not `null`. `get`此属性的访问器不会检索内部列表的排序值; 相反，它将返回 `set` 访问器值。The `get` accessor for this property will not retrieve the sort value of the internal list; instead, it will return the `set` accessor value. 当数据源发生更改时，属性的值将保持不变。The value of the property will persist when the data source changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性通过执行基本排序 。The following example shows how to use the property to perform basic sorting with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `PopulateDataViewAndSort` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 窗体应导入 和 命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性通过执行高级排序 。The following example shows how to use the property to perform advanced sorting with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 窗体应导入 和 命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces.
